backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing control layouts and emitting validated 4‑bit binary event logs, with queries for recent and filtered events.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI GPIO behaviors to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text listing concise summaries for many frontend source files and their roles.
frontend/docs/linux-local-test-bundle.md: Guide for running the Linux test bundle including prerequisites, extraction, and startup steps.
frontend/docs/rpi-bash-runner.md: Instructions for using a Raspberry Pi script that polls backend events and executes GPIO commands.
frontend/docs/rpi-bash-runner.md.backup: Empty backup file placeholder for the rpi-bash-runner documentation.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining theme variables, control panel styles, fullscreen behavior, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx with a dark theme root.
Bash helper providing colored logging and detailed diagnostics for build or deploy step failures.
frontend/scripts/linux_bundle_run.sh: Launches a local IC replica, deploys the app, and provides stop/clean commands with logging and failure diagnostics.
frontend/scripts/package_linux_bundle.sh: Builds backend and frontend, collects artifacts, and packages a distributable Linux test bundle with dependency checks and diagnostics.
frontend/scripts/rpi_event_runner.sh: Polls the backend canister for GPIO event commands and executes them on a Raspberry Pi with state tracking and dry‑run support.
frontend/scripts/rpi_pin_test.sh: Tests Raspberry Pi GPIO pins by toggling configured outputs interactively or automatically with optional dry‑run mode.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component setting up theming and rendering the ControlPanelScreen with a global toaster.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Ad: Modal UI for creating new controls with validation, type‑specific config handling, and automatic default initialization.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Co: Manages loading, syncing, validating, and saving control layout data using React Query and local state. Provides layout context, control creation, and error-handled save operations.

Renders and handles interaction logic for individual controls, including button presses, toggles, sliders, radios, and GPIO signal emission. Validates binary codes and sends HTTP and gpioset commands.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Cr: Displays an Add Control button that opens a modal when in edit mode, with tooltips and loading states. Disables interaction when layout is not ready or mode is not edit.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Dr: Wraps a control with drag-and-drop positioning behavior when editing. Updates control coordinates while preventing dragging in interact mode.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Fu: Provides a button to enter or exit fullscreen mode with error-handling and visual state changes. Hides itself if fullscreen is unsupported.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Im: Allows exporting the current layout to JSON and importing layout files with validation. Shows errors and updates layout when imports succeed.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/In: Displays editable properties for the selected control and syncs changes back to layout state. Supports updating IDs, binary codes, dimensions, types, and radio/dial settings.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Mo: Toggles between edit and interact modes with a button indicating the current mode.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Re: Displays a scrollable list of recent emitted signals with timestamps and allows manual refresh.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Sh: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Us: Provides a card section where users can add custom React components or extensions.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Wo: Renders the control workspace with draggable controls and handles selection based on edit/interact mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useControlLayout.ts: Context hook exposing control layout state, CRUD operations, validation, and layout import/export.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullscreen.ts: Hook for entering, exiting, and toggling fullscreen mode for a DOM element with cross-browser support.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout actions, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePanelMode.ts: Global store hook managing edit/interact panel mode with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentSignals.ts: Fetches recent backend events, polling every 2 seconds using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useSignalEmitter.ts: Provides a mutation for emitting control events to the backend and invalidates recent event queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining theme variables, control panel styling, fullscreen rules, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/lib/binaryCode.ts: Validates 4‑bit binary strings and generates deterministic 4‑bit codes from a seed.
frontend/src/lib/controlDefaults.ts: Provides default configuration objects for each control type excluding id and binaryCode fields.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Triggers a browser download of provided data as a JSON file.
frontend/src/lib/gpioHttp.ts: Sends 4‑bit binary codes to a local /gpio endpoint via HTTP POST with warning‑based error handling.
frontend/src/lib/gpiosetCommands.ts: Converts a 4‑bit binary code into gpioset command strings and sequences for Raspberry Pi GPIO pins.
frontend/src/lib/layoutSerialization.ts: Validates layout structures, exports them to JSON, and imports them with error reporting.
frontend/src/lib/safeBrowser.ts: Provides safe wrappers for browser APIs like localStorage, hostname, and fullscreen detection.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function for merging class names using clsx and tailwind‑merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
Renders the main control panel UI including workspace, side panels, mode controls, and fullscreen handling.
frontend/src/types/controlPanel.ts: Defines TypeScript types for control configurations and layout structures.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, requirements, and feature tracking for GPIO POST interactions.
